name: Michael Huth 0001
content: Michael Huth Visiting Professor at Imperial Researching Privacy-enhancing tech Privacy, ethics & policy making in AI Decentralized finance tech & regulation Past Teaching Cryptography engineering (CO70009). Ethics, Privacy, AI in Society (CO70052) - AI Regulation part. Learning Quantum computing, tech & its applications AI for Science Advances in Bioengineering Championing Innnovation activities of staff & students Equality, diversity & inclusion in tech Collaborating Member of the Working Group (IT Security and Privacy) of the Platform Learning Systems Co-founder and Senior Researcher at Xayn, unlocking next genAI for enterprises Communicating m.huth@imperial.ac.uk
